name: Fabian Williams - Resurrection Collection Gallery Pass

metadata.title: Resurrection Gallery Pass
metadata.name: Resurrection Gallery Pass #1
metadata.description: Fabian is launching Resurrection, the first of its kind NFT collection to showcase mural art that has been destroyed or suppressed over time.  Murals and wall art throughout history have been torn down, degraded and in some cases outright removed by wall owners.  Fabian realized that NFT technology will allow those murals and symbols to live forever on the blockchain.  The series begins with the minting of your Resurrection pass.  This pass allows entry into Fabian's private art gallery where rare art will be showcased and privately auctioned. Visit http://fabianwilliams.art to learn more and to mint your tokens.
